eng: Excuse me, where is the entrance to the temple?
tu: anna, devasthana g ulai popini olpardh?

eng: Should we remove our footwear here?
tu: yenkul yenklena chappal mulpa deppoda?

eng: Where can I keep my shoes safely?
tu: yan yenna shoes olpa jagrthe d deeyoli?

eng: Is there a dress code to enter the temple?
tu: devasthana da ulai povare ov angi padodu?

eng: Can foreigners or tourists enter the main sanctum?
tu: pidai uru dakleg ejjinda thirgare baidhinaklg devasthana da garbagudi k povaoli ya?

eng: What time does the temple open in the morning?
tu: kande yeth ganteg devasthana open apund?

eng: Is photography allowed inside the temple?
tu: devasthana da ulai photo deppoli ya?

eng: Do we need to buy an entry ticket?
tu: pravesha ticket dethonare unda?

eng: Where can I wash my legs before entering?
tu: yenk yenna kar olu dekkoli?

eng: Can we take flowers or fruits inside?
tu: poo parndh dala ulai pathondh povoli ya?

eng: Where can I buy pooja items or flowers?
tu: pooje g bodaina boka poo olpa dethonoli?

eng: How much is the pooja ticket?
tu: pooje da ticket g yeth?

eng: Which counter should I go to for the special darshan?
tu: vishesha darshana g ovu counter g povodu?

eng: Can I offer coconut or bananas here?
tu: mulpa yenk tharai ejjinda parndh koroli ya?

eng: Is there a queue for offering prayers?
tu: kai mugyere line unthoda?

eng: Where should I stand for darshan?
tu: deverna darshana g olpa unthodu?

eng: How long will it take for darshan now?
tu: darshana anaga yeth porthu aavu?

eng: Can I get prasadam after the pooja?
tu: yenk pooje aayi boka prasada thikkuva?

eng: Is there a place to sit and meditate?
tu: mulpa kuldh dhyana malpere jaga unde?

eng: Where can I light the lamp?
tu: yenk deepa olu potthavoli?

eng: Who is the main deity of this temple?
tu: devasthana da mukya dever yer?

eng: What is the history of this temple?
tu: undu devasthana da ethihasa dade?

eng: When is the main festival celebrated?
tu: multha jathre yepa?

eng: What are the temple timings in the evening?
tu: baiyya devasthana yeth gante rdh yeth gante mutta open eppundu?

eng: Can you tell me what ritual is happening now?
tu: yenk dada smapradaya avondhundu ette panpara?

eng: Is there a guide who can explain the temple details?
tu: devasthana da bagge panpinakul yerla ullera?

eng: Can I see the temple chariot?
tu: yenk devasthana da ther topavara?

eng: Is this temple dedicated to Lord Shiva or Vishnu?
tu: undu shiva na devasthana na ath vishnu na devasthana na?

eng: Where can I see thrit thuvolie idol clearly?
tu: yenk deveren olpa sarit thuvoli

eng: Is the temple famous for any special offering?
tu: undu devasthana oik vishesha adh undu?

eng: Where is the prasadam counter?
tu: prasada olpa korpini?

eng: What is being served as prasadam today?
tu: eni prasada g dada korondu ulle?r

eng: Is there free food service here?
tu: mulpa anna prasada free g korpera?

eng: Where should I sit for the meal?
tu: vanas g olpa kullod?

eng: Can I donate for the annadanam?
tu: anna prasada g yenk dala dana koroli ya?

eng: Is the food vegetarian?
tu: vanas sasyahari ya?

eng: Can I take prasadam parcel for someone?
tu: yan prasada n betheklg pathondh povoli ya?

eng: Is there drinking water nearby?
tu: mulpa kaithal d parpina neer olundu?

eng: Where should I wash my hands after eating?
tu: yn thindh yenna kai olpa dekkodu?

eng: Thank you, the prasadam was very nice
tu: solmelu, prasada masth yedde ethund

eng: The temple is so peaceful
tu: devasthana masth shantha undu

eng: The architecture is beautiful
tu: vasthu shilpa matha porlu undu

eng: Thank you for your guidance
tu: erna margadarshana g solmelu

eng: Can you please show me the way to the main deity?
tu: yenk mukya devernade popina saadhi topavara

eng: Is there a restroom nearby
tu: kaithal dshouchalaya unde

eng: Can we stay here for some time?
tu: nama mulpa chur porthu eppugana?

eng: Are there any nearby temples to visit?
tu: mulpa kaithal d bethe ovula devasthana unda popina?

eng: When does the evening aarti start?
tu: baiyya da pooje yeth ganteg suru apini?

eng: Can we offer a donation for the temple?
tu: devasthana g kaas dhana malpoli ya?

eng: Thank you so much, this was a wonderful experience
tu: masth yedde anubhava andd, solmelu
